content.content: Alphaday Summary Alphaday builds crypto experience dashboards for enthusiasts, developers, and projects. Users can drag and drop from hundreds of services, news and social feeds, charts, and dapp functionality to create their daily workflows inside a single dashboard. This eliminates the need to have multiple browser tabs open to get different bits of information. i.e. imagine having token prices, gas prices, twitter feed, latest news headlines, TVL, borrowing rates and any other information any user could possibly want all within one single dashboard.  Team Information My name is Paris and I work in Partnerships and Business Development at Alphaday Alphaday’s co-founder is Deniz Omer and has been involved in the Ethereum space since early 2016 and joined Kyber Network in 2017 as Head of Ecosystem Growth before quitting to start Alphaday full-time in 2021. He previously worked at Thomson Reuters for a decade building financial products that rivaled the Bloomberg Terminal. He is also currently a Venture Partner at IOSG.VC Alphaday’s co-founder Felipe has also been involved in Ethereum since 2016 and was a Developer Advocate at Pegasys and Consensys before quitting to work full time on Alphaday. https://www.linkedin.com/in/denizomer/ https://www.linkedin.com/in/faraggi/ We have assembled a team of 9 individuals, 6 of which are developers.  Github Accounts    GitHub    faraggi - Overview ethereum + python = ❤. faraggi has 61 repositories available. Follow their code on GitHub.         GitHub    ppalomo - Overview Solidity developer -.Net Architect - Scrum Master - Business Analyst - ppalomo         GitHub    v-almonacid - Overview v-almonacid has 19 repositories available. Follow their code on GitHub.         GitHub    elcharitas - Overview Engineering the Web3 with JavaScript, Solidity, Python, and Rust - elcharitas         GitHub    Xavier-Charles - Overview Xavier-Charles has 51 repositories available. Follow their code on GitHub.         GitHub    getgiddy - Overview Tech lover . getgiddy has 54 repositories available. Follow their code on GitHub.       Project Impact Market research we conducted in 2021 concluded that crypto users are overwhelmed with information and spend a lot of time jumping from one news source to another, from one social site to another, and usually have dozens of tabs open to stay up to date with everything happening in a community. Our dashboard aims to provide a single end-point from which users can consume all the information on a project they could possibly want. In this case, we would like to create a MakerDAO ecosystem dashboard that aggregates the following information into a single community dashboard:   The latest MakerDAO official announcements and blog post content   A feed of all news mentions of MakerDAO from coindesk, cointelegraph and 20+ other news sources aggregated from across the internet   A calendar containing all MakerDAO events including MakerDAO Governance votes, meetups, hackathons with MakerDAO bounties, AMAs   Podcast feed containing the latest appearances and interviews given by MakerDAO team members   Youtube stream containing educational MakerDAO content.   MakerDAO Documentation   Integration with MakerDAO Governance Forum to show the latest and trending discussion topics   Twitter & Telegram Integration to show a feed of latest discussions   FAQ, Whitepaper, MKR tokenomics information   MakerDAO Careers integration to show the latest open jobs listed on MakerDAO   MakerDAO metrics including TVL, $DAO Total Trade Volume and other metrics pulled in from Dune Analytics   A widget featuring the MakerDAO roadmap with all the descriptions and links included   Widgets dedicated to MakerDAO Ecosystem    Funding Request and Budget Breakdown 1,200 USD upfront costs for development including integrating the discussion forums, blog post, social feed, jobs listing, TVL and other on-chain metrics. 120 USD per month for 12 months for maintenance including having an Alphaday content analyst quality-checking the dashboard every day and ensuring the Calendar widget is up-to-date with latest MakerDAO events, all news mentions across the internet are captured by the dashboard, any updates not automatically captured by the Alphaday aggregator engine is manually added to the board, and other maintenance tasks. For a total of 2,640 USD.  Legal Structure Legal Name: Alphabox Solutions Pte. Ltd. Entity Type: Incorporated Registered Address: Address: North Canal Road City: Singapore State: Singapore Zip: 059294  Email Address [email protected] Telegram handle @Denizined Discord name Deniz | Alphaday#0697 Twitter handle @DenizOmer  Relevant Links Live Product: https://app.alphaday.com/ Landing Page: https://alphaday.com/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/AlphadayHQ Discord: Alphaday
content.GPT-summary: The post is a grant proposal for Alphaday, a platform that builds crypto experience dashboards for enthusiasts, developers, and projects. The proposal explains the features of the platform and how it aims to provide a single end-point for users to consume all the information on a project they could possibly want. The proposal also includes a funding request and budget breakdown. The post may be of interest to those looking for a platform to aggregate information on crypto projects.
